alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 11:29AM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with occasional gusts to 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, Lower Rio Grande Valley, and Upper Tularosa Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous crosswinds are likely on north to south oriented roadways, especially impacting high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Upper Tularosa Valley
